DOC.brief_title: Effects Mineral Water Consumption Serum Lipid Parameters
DOC.criteria: Healthy base medical history physical examination Fasting serum LDL cholesterol > 100 and/or fast serum triglyceride > 100 Willing drink mineral water 12 week Willing serve blood donor study Informed consent sign Female subject pregnant nursing child Participation clinical trial 90 day Day 01 study Renal hepatic dysfunction Heart disease
